about_the_game:
Join an elite flight formation squadron and take on exhilarating and dangerous missions!

CONTROLLER WITH ANALOG JOYSTICKS OR FLIGHTSTICK REQUIRED

THE 'FORMATION' EXPERIENCE


'Formation' is a VR game where you pilot a powerful combat aircraft as part of a revered formation squadron. Set in a futuristic, Earth-like utopia, 'Formation' features a unique core-gameplay experience that focusses on intense formation flying. Besides fun, addictive gameplay, 'Formation' strives for visceral immersion by providing silky-smooth visuals, a cohesive art style and muscular audio.

3...2...1...MARK!


The moment-to-moment gameplay in Formation mixes arcade flight-sim (like Ace Combat) and 'rhythm-based' genres. Execute maneuvers right on the MARK as notified via your FORMHUD advanced heads-up display. Successfully execute a series of maneuvers to complete a routine. Challenge your ability to stay focussed and perfect advanced maneuvers as structural beams whip closely past your canopy. After your mission, sit back and watch the action sequence that is your expertly executed performance in the highly stylized replay mode. Formation presents a new and addictive slant on flying games.

THE BULLSHARKS


Long ago, war ravaged the planet. Driven back in to the sea, the forces of the Allied Planetary Defence (APD) were facing defeat. In a last-ditch effort one of the few remaining air units — the Bullsharks — almost singlehandedly turned the tide of war. Their formation strikes and heroism are legendary.

Though the guns and missiles once at the behest of APD aviators have long since been decommissioned, the 'Bullsharks' continue to operate — albeit in a non-lethal capacity. Sporting events, commemorations, celebrations, and the occasional airshow are where you will find the present-day '7th' in operation today. The sight of the Bullsharks serves as a reminder of the fierce air-battles of a war that has long since ended, the triumph of the victors, and the glorious fallen.

For those too young to remember the war, the 7th serve a new purpose. What were once instruments of death and destruction have now been reborn as symbols of high intelligence and advanced engineering. In an age of prosperity, the once deadly machines of a century-old conflict now serve to motivate and inspire budding engineers, scientists and pilots as they loudly — but peacefully — thunder through the skies above Ocea.

WELCOME, PILOT


Now that you're up to speed on the backstory, let's discuss this year's mission schedule. Truth be told, 'Air Command' is a little worried about some of the planned routines because of how risky they are. Ocea's mayor isn't too happy either.

Maybe promoting Raiker to Captain and putting him in charge of the squadron wasn't such a smart idea! So, it looks like you're in luck, pilot — the routines this year are going to be more extreme than ever and you've graduated flight school at just the right time. If you play your cards right, you might even be able to sneak in a tower buzz or two.

First things first, you'll need to get your head around the FORMHUD system which will keep you synchronized with your formation squad. Commander Burns himself is expecting you for basic flight training at 0600 hours.

It's time to suit up and get your G-face on!

JOIN THE FORMATION!


Immerse yourself in a fantastic, utopian, sci-fi setting with silky-smooth visuals and awesome audio design. Currently, Formation is an Early Access game. Despite this, there's a ton of content to enjoy before final release. Please read on here for included features and take a look at the Early Access section on this product page to find out more.

2 game modes are currently available* — 'Career' and 'Freefly'.
*please read the Early Access description and roadmap for more info on planned game modes

Career


  • take part in 12 white-knuckle formation routine missions that will push your piloting skills and test your nerve
  • learn how to read and anticipate formation maneuvers by mastering DEFNET's proprietary 'FORMHUD' system
  • pilot the venerated F157 'SUPERCELL' aircraft
  • fly over, under and through the famous landmarks and mega-structures of the floating utopian city of Ocea
  • retry missions to earn medals, promotions and achievements

Freefly


  • explore Ocea and surrounds at your leisure
  • try your hand at completing the 100+ speedgate challenges
  • seek out squadron members to race around checkpoint tracks
  • find secret flightways, locations and special bonuses

FLY IN FORMATION!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 ~2GHz, AMD Ryzen 5 ~2GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board Audio (Realtek High Definition Audio or similar)
  • VR Support: Supports Steam VR and Oculus headsets
  • Additional Notes: CONTROLLER WITH ANALOG JOYSTICKS OR FLIGHTSTICK REQUIRED
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 ~3GHz, AMD Ryzen 7 ~3GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070 Super
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board Audio (Realtek High Definition Audio or similar)
  • VR Support: Supports Steam VR and Oculus headsets
  • Additional Notes: CONTROLLER WITH ANALOG JOYSTICKS OR FLIGHTSTICK REQUIRED

short_description: Join the elite ranks of the 7th Flight Demonstration Squadron AKA the 'Bullsharks'. In wartime, the '7th' invoked fear in the hearts of the enemy. In peacetime, they thrill the citizens of the floating city of Ocea with daring formation routines. Hold your nerve and stay in formation!
